Description.Name: Leopard: Hull Expansion
Description.Details: A full reconstruction of the Leopard, adding several new compartments by expanding its hull. Includes modifying the internal frame, improving the internal wiring and upgrading the engines. The reconstruction will take considerable time and has a very high cost, but once done allows bringing almost anything to away missions.

AssignedCastDescription: This is it, after this there really isn't anything else we can improve. Well, except buying something bigger than a Leopard.
